description:
Description:
--------------

XML request to create Flavor with "is_public" parameter is returning 400 error code. "os-flavor-access:is_public" parameter is used to mention whether flavor created should be listed by all users.

The request to create flavor with is_public parameter is successful with request is sent as JSON.

The same returns 400 or Bad Request exception when it is requested in XML.


CURL COMMANDS:


1. When os-flavor-access:is_public is not mentioned in the REQUEST BODY, [os-flavor-access:is_public="True"] appears in Response body by default(XML)

root@Grizzly-machine2:/home/raj/tempest/tempest/tests/compute/admin# curl -i http://10.233.52.230:8774/v2/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors -X POST -H "X-Auth-Project-Id: admin" -H "User-Agent: python-novaclient" -H "Content-Type: application/xml" -H "Accept: application/xml" -H "X-Auth-Token: -lbhMe2TINgUK+c-BO04qt5ZgSCGYqdWcsYVjWhTypfEKGc95r6VU55WrYOOb1-R2H1HcPP9w8sDZr9kSZx4z3e5cQy4OkCQdcFeVYhi47qOAO+8tULdnmxxDi2zvyo45zGa1lNt7U7bsE2eQJUFP5V5XsP+6iaSg=" -d '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<flavor xmlns:OS-FLV-EXT-DATA="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_extra_data/api/v1.1" xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1" name="test_flavor" ram="512" vcpus="1" disk="10" id="1234"/>'
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
X-Compute-Request-Id: req-97c5486d-289e-40e5-bcfa-5d74cac4f3d2
Content-Type: application/xml
Content-Length: 801
Date: Thu, 20 Dec 2012 12:18:28 GMT

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<flavor xmlns:OS-FLV-DISABLED="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_disabled/api/v1.1" xmlns:os-flavor-access="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_access/api/v2" xmlns:OS-FLV-EXT-DATA="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_extra_data/api/v1.1" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1" disk="10" vcpus="1" ram="512" name="test_flavor" id="1234" swap="" rxtx_factor="1.0" os-flavor-access:is_public="True" OS-FLV-EXT-DATA:ephemeral="0" OS-FLV-DISABLED:disabled="False"><atom:link href="http://10.233.52.230:8774/v2/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors/1234" rel="self"/><atom:link href="http://10.233.52.230:8774/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors/1234" rel="bookmark"/></flavor>root@Grizzly-machine2:/home/raj/tempest/tempest/tests/compute/admin#


2. when os-flavor-access:is_public="True" is mentioned in REQUEST BODY, it throws BadRequest exception.(XML)

root@Grizzly-machine2:/home/raj/tempest/tempest/tests/compute/admin# curl -i http://10.233.52.230:8774/v2/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors -X POST -H "X-Auth-Project-Id: admin" -H "User-Agent: python-novaclient" -H "Content-Type: application/xml" -H "Accept: application/xml" -H "X-Auth-Token: -lbhMe2TINgUK+c-BO04qt5ZgSCGYqdWcsYVjWhTypfEKGc95r6VU55WrYOOb1-R2H1HcPP9w8sDZr9kSZx4z3e5cQy4OkCQdcFeVYhi47qOAO+8tULdnmxxDi2zvyo45zGa1lNt7U7bsE2eQJUFP5V5XsP+6iaSg=" -d '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
> <flavor xmlns:OS-FLV-EXT-DATA="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_extra_data/api/v1.1" xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1" name="test_flavor" ram="512" vcpus="1" os-flavor-access:is_public="True" disk="10" id="1234"/>'
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Content-Length: 128
Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
X-Compute-Request-Id: req-afb0ef11-e0c9-4674-8daf-cf0eb2f3768a
Date: Thu, 20 Dec 2012 12:25:35 GMT

<badRequest code="400" xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1"><message>Malformed request body</message></badRequest>root@Grizzly-machine2:/home/raj/tempest/tempest/tests/compute/admin#



3. when os-flavor-access:is_public="True" is mentioned in REQUEST BODY, it throws BadRequest exception.(JSON)

send: u'POST /v2/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: 10.233.52.230:8774\r\nContent-Length: 177\r\nx-auth-project-id: admin\r\naccept-encoding: gzip, deflate\r\naccept: application/json\r\nx-auth-token: -Ol0TfvoWggZz5tYpj2axI+OlIqk-BaP4-mQ7d1mLlCab8qBlEGcWdysnyAc1pnd+WDbgVHB0FbCfvNYz61FrIPAFGAV1lNFYHko+a9iY400-Qyc057aN4uH0xYzHdiI+uYPO5KfWUCGk0aI=\r\nuser-agent: python-novaclient\r\ncontent-type: application/json\r\n\r\n{"flavor": {"vcpus": 1, "disk": 1, "name": "test-1", "os-flavor-access:is_public": true, "rxtx_factor": 1.0, "OS-FLV-EXT-DATA:ephemeral": 0, "ram": 512, "id": "333", "swap": 0}}'
reply: 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n'
header: X-Compute-Request-Id: req-8f9118ba-31ff-4606-a192-1fc5c18cd4a1
header: Content-Type: application/json
header: Content-Length: 429
header: Date: Thu, 20 Dec 2012 12:31:15 GMT
RESP:{'date': 'Thu, 20 Dec 2012 12:31:15 GMT', 'status': '200', 'x-compute-request-id': 'req-8f9118ba-31ff-4606-a192-1fc5c18cd4a1', 'content-type': 'application/json', 'content-length': '429'} {"flavor": {"name": "test-1", "links": [{"href": "http://10.233.52.230:8774/v2/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors/333", "rel": "self"}, {"href": "http://10.233.52.230:8774/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors/333", "rel": "bookmark"}], "ram": 512, "OS-FLV-DISABLED:disabled": false, "vcpus": 1, "swap": "", "os-flavor-access:is_public": true, "rxtx_factor": 1.0, "OS-FLV-EXT-DATA:ephemeral": 0, "disk": 1, "id": "333"}}
title: XML request to create Flavor with 'is_public' parameter is returning 400 error code

comments.content:
Description:
--------------

XML request to create Flavor with "is_public" parameter is returning 400 error code. "os-flavor-access:is_public" parameter is used to mention whether flavor created should be listed by all users.

The request to create flavor with is_public parameter is successful with request is sent as JSON.

The same returns 400 or Bad Request exception when it is requested in XML.


CURL COMMANDS:


1. When os-flavor-access:is_public is not mentioned in the REQUEST BODY, [os-flavor-access:is_public="True"] appears in Response body by default(XML)

root@Grizzly-machine2:/home/raj/tempest/tempest/tests/compute/admin# curl -i http://10.233.52.230:8774/v2/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors -X POST -H "X-Auth-Project-Id: admin" -H "User-Agent: python-novaclient" -H "Content-Type: application/xml" -H "Accept: application/xml" -H "X-Auth-Token: -lbhMe2TINgUK+c-BO04qt5ZgSCGYqdWcsYVjWhTypfEKGc95r6VU55WrYOOb1-R2H1HcPP9w8sDZr9kSZx4z3e5cQy4OkCQdcFeVYhi47qOAO+8tULdnmxxDi2zvyo45zGa1lNt7U7bsE2eQJUFP5V5XsP+6iaSg=" -d '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<flavor xmlns:OS-FLV-EXT-DATA="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_extra_data/api/v1.1" xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1" name="test_flavor" ram="512" vcpus="1" disk="10" id="1234"/>'
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
X-Compute-Request-Id: req-97c5486d-289e-40e5-bcfa-5d74cac4f3d2
Content-Type: application/xml
Content-Length: 801
Date: Thu, 20 Dec 2012 12:18:28 GMT

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<flavor xmlns:OS-FLV-DISABLED="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_disabled/api/v1.1" xmlns:os-flavor-access="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_access/api/v2" xmlns:OS-FLV-EXT-DATA="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_extra_data/api/v1.1" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1" disk="10" vcpus="1" ram="512" name="test_flavor" id="1234" swap="" rxtx_factor="1.0" os-flavor-access:is_public="True" OS-FLV-EXT-DATA:ephemeral="0" OS-FLV-DISABLED:disabled="False"><atom:link href="http://10.233.52.230:8774/v2/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors/1234" rel="self"/><atom:link href="http://10.233.52.230:8774/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors/1234" rel="bookmark"/></flavor>root@Grizzly-machine2:/home/raj/tempest/tempest/tests/compute/admin#


2. when os-flavor-access:is_public="True" is mentioned in REQUEST BODY, it throws BadRequest exception.(XML)

root@Grizzly-machine2:/home/raj/tempest/tempest/tests/compute/admin# curl -i http://10.233.52.230:8774/v2/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors -X POST -H "X-Auth-Project-Id: admin" -H "User-Agent: python-novaclient" -H "Content-Type: application/xml" -H "Accept: application/xml" -H "X-Auth-Token: -lbhMe2TINgUK+c-BO04qt5ZgSCGYqdWcsYVjWhTypfEKGc95r6VU55WrYOOb1-R2H1HcPP9w8sDZr9kSZx4z3e5cQy4OkCQdcFeVYhi47qOAO+8tULdnmxxDi2zvyo45zGa1lNt7U7bsE2eQJUFP5V5XsP+6iaSg=" -d '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
> <flavor xmlns:OS-FLV-EXT-DATA="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_extra_data/api/v1.1" xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1" name="test_flavor" ram="512" vcpus="1" os-flavor-access:is_public="True" disk="10" id="1234"/>'
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Content-Length: 128
Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
X-Compute-Request-Id: req-afb0ef11-e0c9-4674-8daf-cf0eb2f3768a
Date: Thu, 20 Dec 2012 12:25:35 GMT

<badRequest code="400" xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1"><message>Malformed request body</message></badRequest>root@Grizzly-machine2:/home/raj/tempest/tempest/tests/compute/admin#



3. when os-flavor-access:is_public="True" is mentioned in REQUEST BODY, it throws BadRequest exception.(JSON)

send: u'POST /v2/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: 10.233.52.230:8774\r\nContent-Length: 177\r\nx-auth-project-id: admin\r\naccept-encoding: gzip, deflate\r\naccept: application/json\r\nx-auth-token: -Ol0TfvoWggZz5tYpj2axI+OlIqk-BaP4-mQ7d1mLlCab8qBlEGcWdysnyAc1pnd+WDbgVHB0FbCfvNYz61FrIPAFGAV1lNFYHko+a9iY400-Qyc057aN4uH0xYzHdiI+uYPO5KfWUCGk0aI=\r\nuser-agent: python-novaclient\r\ncontent-type: application/json\r\n\r\n{"flavor": {"vcpus": 1, "disk": 1, "name": "test-1", "os-flavor-access:is_public": true, "rxtx_factor": 1.0, "OS-FLV-EXT-DATA:ephemeral": 0, "ram": 512, "id": "333", "swap": 0}}'
reply: 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n'
header: X-Compute-Request-Id: req-8f9118ba-31ff-4606-a192-1fc5c18cd4a1
header: Content-Type: application/json
header: Content-Length: 429
header: Date: Thu, 20 Dec 2012 12:31:15 GMT
RESP:{'date': 'Thu, 20 Dec 2012 12:31:15 GMT', 'status': '200', 'x-compute-request-id': 'req-8f9118ba-31ff-4606-a192-1fc5c18cd4a1', 'content-type': 'application/json', 'content-length': '429'} {"flavor": {"name": "test-1", "links": [{"href": "http://10.233.52.230:8774/v2/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors/333", "rel": "self"}, {"href": "http://10.233.52.230:8774/d7abe630841f4bc49125e2c4f846bcf6/flavors/333", "rel": "bookmark"}], "ram": 512, "OS-FLV-DISABLED:disabled": false, "vcpus": 1, "swap": "", "os-flavor-access:is_public": true, "rxtx_factor": 1.0, "OS-FLV-EXT-DATA:ephemeral": 0, "disk": 1, "id": "333"}}

comments.content:
In #2, you are missing a namespace. can you please add that in the xml?

 xmlns:os-flavor-access="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/flavor_access/api/v2"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v
